short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily chat on Nitro Type, without having to switch tabs back and forth.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chat (NTWWC) will make it easy to chat on Nitro Type. On the new version 5, you now can add your own chat as well. 

Version 5 features:
- Add up to 3 chats of your own.
- Delete the chats you added
- Compact "chat" button
